attributes.action: Hold a referendum on Brexit on 23rd June 2026 as this is the 10 year anniversary
attributes.additional_details: We truly believe that in the 10 years that have passed, many people are likely to have changed their minds on the subject of 'should we be in our out of the EU'. Due to the (circa) 10 year timeframe since the last referendum, we are asking for a new referendum to be held on the date 23/06/2026
attributes.background: If one has not been held beforehand, to hold a re-run of the Brexit referendum, to be timed for 23/06/2026 with 2 options on the ballot paper. Re-join the EU or Stay out of the EU

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Have a new referendum on EU membership" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727964
